Video.title: Be Healthy: Real people, real change - Bruno
Video.description: Be Healthy, our global health and well-being program for associates, helped Bruno, a Novartis associate from Austria, to make a major change in his life. Now he has more strength and energy to enjoy the outdoors again.

Video.title: Be Healthy: Real people, real change - Girish
Video.description: Girish works for Novartis in India. Be Healthy, our global health and well-being program for associates, helped him quit smoking -- and bring him closer to his family.

Video.title: Be Healthy: Real people, real change - Michel
Video.description: Michel, a Novartis associates from Brazil, used to play professional football. Be Healthy, our global health and well-being program for associates, helped him rekindle this active lifestyle.

Video.title: Be Healthy: Real people, real change - Tenta
Video.description: Tenta works for Novartis in Spain. Be Healthy, our global health and well-being program for associates, helped motivate her to change her life and become the person she wanted to be - exceeding even her own expectations.

Video.title: Novartis Be Healthy
Video.description: oseph Jimenez, CEO of Novartis, talks about how Novartis Group Company associates across 32 countries are participating in a new Novartis health and well-being initiative during the first Novartis Be Healthy Celebration Week from September 19-23, 2011. Be Healthy is an internal initiative for the benefit of Novartis associates.

Video.title: Be Healthy: the first company-wide health and well-being initiative at Novartis
Video.description: As a healthcare company, Novartis recognizes that employees are an integral part of the company's success and a healthy workforce underpins business growth.
